channel.title: jetpack on Jane - A super concise theme for Hugo
channel.description: Recent content in jetpack on Jane - A super concise theme for Hugo

item.title: jetpack基础
item.description: 什么是jiepack implementation("org.jetbrains.kotlinx:kotlinx-coroutines-core:1.4.2") import kotlinx.coroutines.* 常用的jiepack库 job.cancel(), job.join(), job.cancelAndJoin() 取消是协作的 isActive 在 finally 中释放资源 finally 块中调用挂起函数, withContext(NonCancellable){xxx} 绝大多数取消一个协程的理由是它有可能
